Text:
There is some stuff Kid Koala is doing in a group called 'Pillowfight'. This collection is missing that material so lemme know if you gotta line on it!

http://kidkoala.com/ice-cream-news/sxsw2012pillowfight/

This is also a good link to check out T-shirts and other merch than a guy can pick up by supporting the artists to look good wit. :)
Actually... I'm finding stuff from these artists all over the place not included in this package... they do a lot of vinyl n stuff... Really gotta dig to get to the bottom of these artists talent.
